description.zh-cn: 中国东周春秋末期的教育家、哲学家，儒家学派的创始人。
description.en: An educator and philosopher of the late Spring and Autumn period of the Eastern Zhou dynasty in China, and the founder of Confucianism.

description.zh-cn: 孔子的父亲，鲁国陬邑大夫。
description.en: Father of Confucius, a grand master of Zouyi in the State of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 孔子的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 孔子的妻子，宋国人。
description.en: Wife of Confucius, from the State of Song.

description.zh-cn: 孔子的独子，先于孔子去世。
description.en: The only son of Confucius, who predeceased him.

description.zh-cn: 孔子的孙子，孔鲤的儿子。
description.en: Grandson of Confucius, son of Kong Li.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代思想家，道家学派创始人，孔子曾向其问礼。
description.en: An ancient Chinese philosopher, founder of Taoism, from whom Confucius once inquired about rites.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期鲁国的乐官，孔子曾向他学习弹琴。
description.en: A music official in the State of Lu during the Spring and Autumn period, from whom Confucius learned to play the guqin.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期郯国国君，因其博学多才，孔子曾拜其为师。
description.en: The ruler of the State of Tan during the Spring and Autumn period. Due to his extensive knowledge, Confucius once regarded him as a teacher.

description.zh-cn: 孔子最得意的弟子之一，被列为孔门十哲之首，以德行著称。
description.en: One of Confucius's most favored disciples, ranked first among the Ten Sages of the Confucian School, known for his virtue.

description.zh-cn: 孔子著名弟子，孔门十哲之一，以政事见长，性格直率勇敢。
description.en: A famous disciple of Confucius, one of the Ten Sages of the Confucian School, known for his administrative skills and his straightforward and brave personality.

description.zh-cn: 孔子著名弟子，孔门十哲之一，以言语闻名，亦善于经商。
description.en: A famous disciple of Confucius, one of the Ten Sages of the Confucian School, renowned for his eloquence and skill in business.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期鲁国君主，曾任用孔子担任中都宰、司空、大司寇等要职。
description.en: The ruler of the State of Lu during the Spring and Autumn period, who appointed Confucius to key positions such as Magistrate of Zhongdu, Minister of Works, and Minister of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期齐国君主，曾与孔子论政但未予重用。
description.en: The ruler of the State of Qi during the Spring and Autumn period, who discussed governance with Confucius but did not appoint him to a significant position.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期齐国相国，曾劝阻齐景公封赏孔子。
description.en: The prime minister of the State of Qi during the Spring and Autumn period, who advised Duke Jing of Qi against enfeoffing Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 孔子在鲁国执政时策划的旨在削弱三桓势力的政治军事行动。
description.en: A political and military action planned by Confucius during his administration in the State of Lu, aimed at weakening the power of the Three Huan families.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期鲁国的三家强盛贵族（季孙氏、叔孙氏、孟孙氏），长期掌控鲁国政权。
description.en: The three powerful aristocratic families (Jisun, Shusun, and Mengsun) in the State of Lu during the Spring and Autumn period, who controlled the state's power for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期宋国司马，曾试图谋害孔子。
description.en: The Minister of War of the State of Song during the Spring and Autumn period, who attempted to assassinate Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期楚国君主，曾派人聘请孔子，并欲封其土地。
description.en: The king of the State of Chu during the Spring and Autumn period, who sent emissaries to invite Confucius and intended to grant him territory.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期楚国令尹，劝阻楚昭王封地给孔子。
description.en: The prime minister (Lingyin) of the State of Chu during the Spring and Autumn period, who advised King Zhao of Chu against granting land to Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期鲁国卿大夫，季孙氏领袖。将孔子迎回鲁国，但未予重用。
description.en: A minister of the State of Lu and leader of the Jisun clan during the Spring and Autumn period. He welcomed Confucius back to Lu but did not grant him a significant position.

description.zh-cn: 由孔子创立的、源于中国并影响深远的思想体系和哲学传统。
description.en: A system of thought and philosophical tradition originating in China, founded by Confucius, with far-reaching influence.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代儒家典籍，相传为孔子依据鲁国史料编修而成。
description.en: An ancient Chinese Confucian classic, said to have been compiled by Confucius based on the historical records of the State of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝时期由董仲舒倡议并施行的思想统一政策，确立了儒学在中国历史上的主导地位。
description.en: An ideological unification policy initiated by Dong Zhongshu and implemented during the reign of Emperor Wu of Han, which established the dominant position of Confucianism in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第七位皇帝，采纳董仲舒建议，推行“罢黜百家，独尊儒术”政策。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Western Han dynasty, who adopted Dong Zhongshu's suggestion and implemented the policy of 'dismissing the hundred schools of thought and exclusively honoring Confucianism'.

description.zh-cn: 西汉思想家，向汉武帝提出“罢黜百家，独尊儒术”的建议。
description.en: A philosopher of the Western Han dynasty who proposed the idea of 'dismissing the hundred schools of thought and exclusively honoring Confucianism' to Emperor Wu of Han.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国文化大革命后期的一场政治运动，对孔子及其思想进行了批判。
description.en: A political campaign in the later stages of the Cultural Revolution in the People's Republic of China, which involved criticism of Confucius and his philosophy.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的缔造者之一，在其主导的“批林批孔”运动中不赞成孔子。
description.en: One of the founders of the People's Republic of China, who expressed disapproval of Confucius during the 'Criticize Lin, Criticize Confucius' campaign he led.

description.zh-cn: 孔子弟子，因相貌丑陋起初不被孔子看好，后以其成就使孔子感叹“以貌取人，失之子羽”。
description.en: A disciple of Confucius, who was initially misjudged by Confucius due to his ugly appearance. His later achievements led Confucius to lament, 'I have judged a person by appearance and have been mistaken in Ziyu'.

nodes.id: 格奥尔格·威廉·弗里德里希·黑格尔

zh-cn: 格奥尔格·威廉·弗里德里希·黑格尔

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家，认为孔子的道德哲学只是一些善良的道德教条，缺乏思辨性。
description.en: A German philosopher who considered Confucius's moral philosophy to be merely a collection of benevolent moral maxims lacking in speculative thought.

description.zh-cn: 孔子是儒家学派的创始人。
description.en: Confucius is the founder of the Confucian school of thought.

description.zh-cn: 孔子曾向老子问礼。
description.en: Confucius once inquired with Laozi about the rites.

description.zh-cn: 孔子向师襄子学习弹琴。
description.en: Confucius learned to play the guqin from Master Xiang.

description.zh-cn: 孔子拜郯子为师，向其学习。
description.en: Confucius regarded Duke Tan as a teacher and learned from him.

description.zh-cn: 颜回是孔子最得意的弟子。
description.en: Yan Hui was Confucius's most favored disciple.

description.zh-cn: 子路是孔子的弟子。
description.en: Zilu was a disciple of Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 子贡是孔子的弟子。
description.en: Zigong was a disciple of Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 鲁定公先后任命孔子为中都宰、司空、大司寇。
description.en: Duke Ding of Lu successively appointed Confucius as Magistrate of Zhongdu, Minister of Works, and Minister of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 齐景公问政于孔子。
description.en: Duke Jing of Qi consulted Confucius on matters of governance.

description.zh-cn: 晏婴进言劝阻齐景公封孔子为尼谿田大夫。
description.en: Yan Ying advised Duke Jing of Qi against enfeoffing Confucius with the lands of Nixi.

description.zh-cn: 孔子策划实施了“堕三都”行动以削弱三桓势力。
description.en: Confucius planned and implemented the 'Dismantling of the Three Capitals' campaign to weaken the power of the Three Huan families.

description.zh-cn: “堕三都”行动旨在削弱三桓的军事和政治实力，但最终功败垂成。
description.en: The 'Dismantling of the Three Capitals' campaign aimed to weaken the military and political power of the Three Huan families, but it ultimately failed.

description.zh-cn: 桓魋在宋国欲加害孔子。
description.en: Huan Tui intended to harm Confucius in the State of Song.

description.zh-cn: 楚昭王派人聘请孔子，并欲封其土地。
description.en: King Zhao of Chu sent emissaries to invite Confucius and intended to grant him territory.

description.zh-cn: 子西以孔子及其弟子将来会威胁楚国统治为由，劝阻楚昭王封地给孔子。
description.en: Zixi advised King Zhao against granting land to Confucius, arguing that Confucius and his disciples would pose a threat to the rule of Chu in the future.

description.zh-cn: 季康子派人将年近七十岁的孔子迎回鲁国，尊为国老。
description.en: Ji Kangzi sent men to welcome the nearly 70-year-old Confucius back to the State of Lu, honoring him as a state elder.

description.zh-cn: 相传孔子依据鲁国史料编修了《春秋》。
description.en: It is said that Confucius compiled the Spring and Autumn Annals based on the historical records of the State of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 董仲舒向汉武帝倡议“罢黜百家，独尊儒术”。
description.en: Dong Zhongshu proposed to Emperor Wu of Han to 'dismiss the hundred schools of thought and exclusively honor Confucianism'.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝采纳董仲舒的建议，施行了“独尊儒术”的政策。
description.en: Emperor Wu of Han adopted Dong Zhongshu's suggestion and implemented the policy of 'exclusively honoring Confucianism'.

description.zh-cn: “独尊儒术”政策确立了儒学在中国文化中的主轴地位。
description.en: The policy of 'exclusively honoring Confucianism' established the central position of Confucianism in Chinese culture.

description.zh-cn: 批林批孔运动对孔子及其思想进行了全国性的批判，并破坏了相关文物古迹。
description.en: The 'Criticize Lin, Criticize Confucius' campaign launched a nationwide critique of Confucius and his philosophy, and destroyed related cultural relics and historical sites.

description.zh-cn: 澹台灭明是孔子的弟子。
description.en: Tantai Mieming was a disciple of Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 澹台灭明的成就使孔子认识到自己“以貌取人”的错误，并对此进行了反思。
description.en: The achievements of Tantai Mieming made Confucius realize his mistake of 'judging a person by appearance' and reflect upon it.

relationships.source: 格奥尔格·威廉·弗里德里希·黑格尔

description.zh-cn: 黑格尔在其哲学史讲座中批评孔子的道德哲学缺乏思辨性。
description.en: In his lectures on the history of philosophy, Hegel criticized Confucius's moral philosophy for its lack of speculative thought.
